// while walking in grass, you eventually receive those messages (the server init the battle) 
// note that you can still move around and do other stuff, but ofc you can't generate a new battle while one is active


RECEIVE: (message that tells you a battle is happening)
00000000: 8000 4e12 0003 0001 7012 0003 0001 7012  ..N.....p.....p.
00000001: 0004 0001 7301 0100 0163 0100 0001 6e04  ....s....c....n.
00000002: 0000 0013 0001 6f01 0000 0172 0400 0000  ......o....r....
00000003: 0000 0163 0800 0f63 616c 6c2e 752e 6465  ...c...call.u.de
00000004: 7845 6e74 7279 0001 6103 000d 0001 6302  xEntry..a.....c.
00000005: 01                                       .

RECEIVE:
some encrypted data

RECEIVE: (generic info about the encounter)
00000000: 8000 b412 0003 0001 7012 0003 0001 7012  ........p.....p.
00000001: 0002 0001 7208 0009 456e 636f 756e 7465  ....r...Encounte
00000002: 7200 0464 6174 6112 000a 0002 7478 0400  r..data.....tx..
00000003: 0000 1500 0164 0400 0000 0200 0269 6d01  .....d.......im.
00000004: 0000 0274 7904 0000 004b 0002 747a 0400  ...ty....K..tz..
00000005: 0000 0000 036d 6964 0400 0000 0200 0269  .....mid.......i
00000006: 7301 0000 0365 6e63 0800 0752 6174 7461  s....enc...Ratta
00000007: 7461 0002 6572 0800 0a64 6e4c 474c 476d  ta..er...dnLGLGm
00000008: 6d39 4b00 0d65 6e63 6f75 6e74 6572 5479  m9K..encounterTy
00000009: 7065 0800 0547 7261 7373 0001 7204 0000  pe...Grass..r...
0000000a: 0000 0001 6308 0004 6d6f 7665 0001 6103  ....c...move..a.
0000000b: 000d 0001 6302 01                        ....c..

RECEIVE: (the room newly created for the battle)
00000000: 8000 9612 0003 0001 7012 0003 0001 7012  ........p.....p.
00000001: 0001 0004 6461 7461 1200 0300 0862 6174  ....data.....bat
00000002: 746c 6549 6408 0024 3661 3161 6364 3633  tleId..$6a1acd63
00000003: 2d30 6361 372d 3430 3963 2d39 6162 652d  -0ca7-409c-9abe-
00000004: 3030 6364 6231 3966 3832 3162 0008 726f  00cdb19f821b..ro
00000005: 6f6d 4e61 6d65 0800 0a64 6e4c 474c 476d  omName...dnLGLGm
00000006: 6d39 4b00 0672 6f6f 6d49 6404 0002 10ff  m9K..roomId.....
00000007: 0001 7204 0002 10ff 0001 6308 0010 6261  ..r.......c...ba
00000008: 7474 6c65 2e72 6f6f 6d52 6561 6479 0001  ttle.roomReady..
00000009: 6103 000d 0001 6302 01                   a.....c..
